Text: Thanx a bunch autoslump. I have this book in dead tree format. It was actually Sam Harris that made me see the tabu that exists in our society on criticising religion.

Thank you so much autoslump. This is truely apreciated.

If you can release "The end of Faith" as well, I will get down and my knees and thank god. (or suck his balls, witchever he likes best)
Please Seed. I'll seed to 10:1 ratio if I can get this.
